summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of East Madison Street from Thirty-third Avenue North to East Mercer Street et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewer under Ordinance No. 14985 creating Local Improvement District No. 1339 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
